originalText.text: Dr Nordvig was very attentive. She asked questions, listened then offered smart advice. She also offered great insight into options we should try.  We waited a year to meet with her and she is extremely worth it. I’m glad she’s our Doctor.

text.text: Dr Nordvig was very attentive. She asked questions, listened then offered smart advice. She also offered great insight into options we should try.  We waited a year to meet with her and she is extremely worth it. I’m glad she’s our Doctor.

originalText.text:
I’m very so grateful to my neurologist Dr Ezrelie for being the one who recommended me to doctor Nordvig.
One thing I want to start with is don’t settle for the second best if you can have the very best and that is Dr. Nordvig by all means.  I can say everything she does is done with excellence.
How the doctor listened to everything about me from my family member all the follow up that need to be done Dr Nordvig did so promptly. How the doctor fought on my behave with insurance company to approve my meds. Dr Nordvig never gave up and never gives up till she wins for the patient interest's.
I have a gratitude to the doctor Nordvig.
Doctor follow up is perfect. Doctor hired an outstanding NP to assist her who is the best back plan one can have.
I can say so many more good things and not be finished with all the complements
Me and my family has.
Just remember Dr Nordvig is the number one in Alzheimer’s Feild and in neurosciences. Don’t waste your time this should be your first stop.
Thanks loads. Doctor
George

originalText.text: Dr. Nordvig is an excellent physician, thorough and compassionate addressing all of my concerns with patience,  kindness and understanding. I feel comfortable and confident being in her care. I am a doctor and know how it feels being on the other side.

text.text: Dr. Nordvig is an excellent physician, thorough and compassionate addressing all of my concerns with patience,  kindness and understanding. I feel comfortable and confident being in her care. I am a doctor and know how it feels being on the other side.

originalText.text: Dr Nordvig is not only a highly skilled neurologist but an extremely caring, compassionate and diligent doctor. I am immensely fortunate to be under her care.

text.text: Dr Nordvig is not only a highly skilled neurologist but an extremely caring, compassionate and diligent doctor. I am immensely fortunate to be under her care.

originalText.text: Doctor Nordvig is an incredible sensible doctor who show understanding and care for Joan. Me as a the caregiver couldn’t be more happy to have such a great doctor.
